CustomReport.title: Recommended Taxa for List
CustomReport.description: Extract the recommended taxa for a specified list. Works from the Taxon Dictionary by selecting any species in the list

SQL.Where: SELECT DISTINCT TV.Taxon_Version_Key, T.Item_name,ITN.Common_Name,TV.Attribute,TL.Item_Name as List FROM Taxon T INNER JOIN Taxon_Version TV ON TV.Taxon_Key = T.Taxon_Key INNER JOIN Taxon_List_Item TLI ON TLI.Taxon_version_Key = TV.Taxon_Version_Key INNER JOIN Taxon_Rank TR ON TR.Taxon_Rank_Key = TLI.Taxon_Rank_Key INNER JOIN INDEX_Taxon_Name ITN ON ITN.Recommended_taxon_List_Item_Key = TLI.Taxon_List_Item_Key INNER JOIN Taxon_List_Item TLI2 ON TLI2.Taxon_List_Item_Key = ITN.Taxon_List_Item_Key INNER JOIN Taxon_List_Version TLV ON TLV.Taxon_List_Version_Key = TLI2.Taxon_List_Version_Key INNER JOIN Taxon_List TL ON TL.Taxon_List_Key = TLV.Taxon_List_Key WHERE TL.Taxon_List_Key = (SELECT Taxon_List.Taxon_List_Key /**/FROM/**/ Taxon_List INNER JOIN Taxon_List_Version on Taxon_List_Version.Taxon_List_Key = Taxon_List.Taxon_List_Key INNER JOIN Taxon_List_Item ON Taxon_LIst_Item.Taxon_List_Version_Key = Taxon_List_Version.Taxon_List_Version_Key WHERE Taxon_List_Item.Taxon_List_Item_Key = '%s') AND TR.Sequence > 240
Select Distinct 'This report only works from the taxon dictionary' as Item_Name, 'Quick Report' as Attribute FROM Survey
